body_html:
Hi @isaprykin, thanks for your help.

Leaving the default value of num_tokens = -1 still raises the exception, you can try it running the code provided (can you reproduce the error?).

This code is a simplification, of course, I actually use several processes which I want to synchronize with an effective barrier, and as far as I understood this means that num_tokens needs to be 0.

I am not able to reproduce the SEGV, @drpngx. It just happened once.

body:
Hi @isaprykin, thanks for your help.

Leaving the default value of num_tokens = -1 still raises the exception, you can try it running the code provided (can you reproduce the error?).

This code is a simplification, of course, I actually use several processes which I want to synchronize with an effective barrier, and as far as I understood this means that num_tokens needs to be 0.

I am not able to reproduce the SEGV, @drpngx. It just happened once.
